findings.title: AdjustVariables permission addresses can change
findings.description: The AdjustVariables permission allows addresses to change various variables including baseUriExtended, Thoreum address, EpicHero address, reflect address, maxLevel and maxRarity values, wbnbAddress, epicHeroNFTAddress, and manually set dividends.

findings.title: ManagePacks Permission Addresses Can Add and Edit Packs
findings.description: ManagePacks permission addresses have unrestricted access to add and edit packs.

findings.title: ManagePacks permission addresses can change pack’s saleRunning value.
findings.description: The ManagePacks permission addresses have the ability to modify the saleRunning value of a pack, which could lead to unauthorized changes.

findings.title: ManageAttributes permission addresses can add and edit attributes and levelUpPrices.
findings.description: Permission addresses with ManageAttributes role have excessive privileges to modify attributes and levelUpPrices.

findings.title: Mint permission addresses can mint and burn.
findings.description: Addresses with Mint permission have the ability to mint and burn tokens, which may lead to unauthorized token creation or destruction.

findings.title: ManageAttributes permission addresses can change heroes’ levels and rarity.
findings.description: The ManageAttributes permission addresses have unauthorized access to modify heroes' levels and rarity, potentially leading to unintended consequences.

findings.title: Withdraw permission addresses can withdraw BEP20 tokens and BNBs.
findings.description: The Withdraw permission addresses have the capability to withdraw both BEP20 tokens and BNBs.

findings.title: RegisterNewMints permission addresses can initialize mints
findings.description: The RegisterNewMints permission addresses have the ability to initialize new mints.

findings.title: Unrestricted Minting and Token Update
findings.description: RegisterNewMints permission addresses can register new mints and update burned tokens, potentially leading to unauthorized token creation and manipulation.

findings.title: AdjustVariables permission addresses can change wbnbAddress and epicHeroNFTAddress
findings.description: The AdjustVariables permission addresses have the ability to modify critical contract variables such as wbnbAddress and epicHeroNFTAddress, which could lead to unauthorized changes and potential security risks.

findings.title: AdjustVariables permission addresses can manually set dividends.
findings.description: The AdjustVariables permission addresses have the ability to manually set dividends, which could lead to potential security issues.

findings.title: RetrieveTokens Permission Addresses Can Withdraw BEP20 Tokens and BNBs
findings.description: Permission addresses with RetrieveTokens role can withdraw both BEP20 tokens and BNBs without any restrictions.

findings.title: OUT_OF_GAS exception in batchRegisterMints() function
findings.description: The function batchRegisterMints() uses a loop to register mints by list provided and will be aborted with OUT_OF_GAS exception if there is a long tokenIds list.

findings.title: OUT_OF_GAS exception in adminMintMultiple() function
findings.description: The function adminMintMultiple() uses a loop to mint heroes by list provided and will be aborted with OUT_OF_GAS exception if there is a long list.
